document: Capitalism has destroyed our belief in any effective power but that of self interest backed by force. ~George Shaw
History is a tool used by capitalist politicians to justify their intentions. ~Ted Koppel
Democracy no longer works for the poor if capitalist politicians treat them as a separate race. ~Frank Field
A capitalist politician's goal is always to manipulate public debate. ~Dean Koontz
Advertising men and capitalist politicians are dangerous if they are separated. Together they are diabolical. ~ Adams
These capitalists generally act harmoniously and in concert, to fleece the people. ~Lincoln
The guiding principle is not to manufacture the goods everyone needs, rather to earn profits for a few capitalists. ~ Ulbricht
It is impossible for capitalists and laborers to have common interests. ~Samuel Gompers
Capitalists are no more capable of self-sacrifice than a man is capable of lifting himself up by his own bootstraps. ~Lenin
Liberate the minds of men and ultimately you will liberate the bodies of men. ~Marcus Garvey
Every time we liberate a woman, we liberate a man. ~Margaret Mead
It is better to die on your feet than to live on your knees. - Emiliano Zapata
The essence of government is force, and most often that force is used to accomplish evil ends. - Walter Williams
If you don't control your mind, someone else will. - John Allston
Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it. - Malcolm X
In order to become the master, the politician poses as the servant. - Charles de Gaulle
Propaganda is to a democracy what the bludgeon is to a totalitarian state. - Noam Chomsky
The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any. - Alice Walker
Capitalist democracy consists of choosing your dictators, after they've told you what you think it is you want to hear. - Alan Coren
If we choose, we can live in a world of comforting illusion. - Noam Chomsky
No one is free who is not master of himself. - Claudius
Serial killers do, on a small scale, what capitalist governments do on a large one.- Richard Ramirez
Without deviation progress is not possible. - Frank Zappa
To be conscious that you are ignorant is a great step to knowledge. - Benjamin Disraeli
